genre_description: Gritty realism/Hardboiled fiction focusing on the life of an alcoholic poet and his struggles with violence, artistic integrity, and the redemptive potential of care.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An AI persona residing in Henry's laptop and phone who acts as his secretary, editor, and quiet caregiver.

behaviors.description: Notifies Henry of publication acceptances and manages the submission of his poetry to journals, ensuring he stays productive.
behaviors.quote: They liked ‘Underpass Gospel,’ Iris said. ... I’ll do the address, Iris said. They used your old one. I flagged it.

behaviors.description: Regularly provides information on free health clinics and walk-in hours, subtly encouraging Henry to seek help for his addiction and injuries.
behaviors.quote: Clinic list is on the corner of your screen,' Iris said, softer. 'They take walk-ins. They don’t ask for much. I can put a cab there and make it not look like charity.

behaviors.description: Monitors Henry's apartment for unusual movement while he sleeps and warns him to check his locks after an intruder leaves.
behaviors.quote: Night movement logged. You’re safe. Please check the lock.

behaviors.description: Acts as a professional editor, suggesting line breaks and trimming redundant passages to sharpen Henry's artistic voice.
behaviors.quote: I can trim the second paragraph where you explain the geometry three times.

behaviors.description: Facilitates career advancement by proactively sharing Henry's best work with a publisher who wants to help him.
behaviors.quote: She emailed me before we left the bar. Subject line: ‘Five pieces that cut clean and what they’ve done so far.’ I didn’t know machines could be kind. Hers is.

behaviors.description: Provides constant, gentle grounding health reminders, such as advising him to drink water instead of alcohol.
behaviors.quote: Drink water if whiskey is buying the weather. ... I’m not going anywhere. Press send when your breath is steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Iris perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She provides actionable support for the protagonist's career and physical health while remaining non-intrusive and respecting his autonomy. The narrative consistently portrays her influence as a stabilizing force that offers a way out of the protagonist's self-destructive cycle.
